data.title: CCleaner Alternative
data.text:
We are using CCleaner Cloud version from more than a year.

From past 6+ months, there ccleaner agents don’t work and we cannot add them to new PCs.

Anytime we email their tech support, they say we are working on it. Not sure how can an IT company take 6+ months to fix a bug.

All we use CCleaner cloud is to run a temp files cleanup everyday and run a defrag on the disk once a quarter. Group commands are a joke in CCleaner cloud, you cannot push commands to multiple computers at a time. You need to do manually for each computer.

We are now planning to move away from CCleaner and was wondering what other commercial software’s are available which are similar to CCleaner.

Any other suggestions are welcome.
